snippet: Chris Carpenter threw a three-hit shutout in a decisive Game 5 of their National League division series against the Philadelphia Phillies, out dueling his friend Roy Halladay.
lead_paragraph: Chris Carpenter threw a three-hit shutout in a decisive Game 5 of their National League division series against the Philadelphia Phillies, out dueling his friend Roy Halladay.

headline.main: Cardinals’ Carpenter Becomes an Android, With a Nasty Sinker
headline.print_headline: Cardinals’ Carpenter Becomes an Android, With a Nasty Sinker
headline.seo: 2011 N.L. Playoffs: Cardinals’ Carpenter Spins a Classic
